Heading: Center column
Note: References are printed in a narrow column in the center of the page between two columns of text

Heading: Page end
Note: References are printed at the foot of the page

Heading: Side column
Note: References are printed in a column to the side of the scripture

Heading: Verse end
Note: References are printed at the end of the applicable verse

Heading: Unknown
Note: The person creating the ONIX record does not know where the references are located
